attributes.name: Bear Pelt Rug
attributes.description: A soft and fuzzy bear rug to warm your bare feet, or to lounge upon seductively. Or both.

attributes.name: Bedsheet Curtains
attributes.description: Simple lengths you can string up on your wall or window. Your neighbors will never know that these used to be your bedsheets.

attributes.name: Bloody Posh Curtains
attributes.description: These curtains are so lovely, you won't even want to look out the window.

attributes.name: Bloody Posh Valance
attributes.description: This red velvet valance gives a sumptuous look to any captain's window.

attributes.name: Bloody Ragged Curtains
attributes.description: These curtains might have been the height of luxury...once.

attributes.name: Booty Storage Chest
attributes.description:
A chest that grants access to your storage, and increases your storage when placed in your home. 
The kind of chest every pirate dreams of digging up.

attributes.name: Broken Chime Post
attributes.description: An old windchime holder with no windchimes. It looks like it is barely standing up.

attributes.name: Captain's Bath
attributes.description: Only the captain is allowed to indulge in that rarest of pirate luxuries - a bath.

attributes.name: Cerulean Curtains
attributes.description: The sky's the limit with these blue sky drapes. It's the next best thing to being outside.

attributes.name: Cerulean Drape
attributes.description: A thick, blue drape to block the light from a window. Perfect for those who like to sleep until noon.

attributes.name: Cerulean Valance
attributes.description: A lovely blue colored fabric hanging loosely. For those who want all the style of a curtain with none of the utility.

attributes.name: Cherry Curtains
attributes.description: Frame your window with style. And nothing says 'style' like these cherry colored drapes. They really make the room pop.

attributes.name: Cherry Drape
attributes.description: You won't feel dreary with this delightfully dapper drape. The bright red reminds you of fresh fruit.

attributes.name: Cherry Valance
attributes.description: Think of this bright red fabric like a window hat. It is pretty, and does very little to keep the light out.

attributes.name: Colorful Wind Chimes
attributes.description: When the wind blows from the south, the colorful ribbons and melody reminds you of your childhood. Ring any bells?

attributes.name: Copper Water Pump
attributes.description: The ingenious copper mechanism atop this sink actually heats the water as you pump it! Incredible!

attributes.name: Crescent Bloody Rug
attributes.description: The rich red color of this rug hides bloodstains extremely well.

attributes.name: Crowded Armory Rack
attributes.description: This is the armory rack of a person who has had many, many adventures.

attributes.name: Cursed Storage Chest
attributes.description:
A chest that grants access to your storage, and increases your storage when placed in your home. 
Definitely cursed, 100%.

attributes.name: Curved Grassy Rug
attributes.description: This cheerful green rug feels especially good on bare feet. It reminds you of spring grass.

attributes.name: Curved Maritime Rug
attributes.description: Often placed in a lady's cabin, because a woman's bare feet touching the wood of the ship was considered bad luck.

attributes.name: Dynastic Stove
attributes.description: There's no better place to prepare a heavenly feast.

attributes.name: Dynasty Storage Chest
attributes.description:
A chest that grants access to your storage, and increases your storage when placed in your home. 
Such fine craftsmanship, and a style rarely seen.

attributes.name: Ebony Painted Bamboo Blinds
attributes.description: The best part of these blinds is that you can make the dragons disappear and reappear by tilting the slats.

attributes.name: Ebony Weapon Rack
attributes.description: For extra peace of mind, keep this rosewood weapon rack right next to your bed.

attributes.name: Fishnet Rug
attributes.description: What a creative use for a fishing net. Sweeping dirt under it is pointless, though.

attributes.name: Fraying Cloth Rug
attributes.description: Technically meets the bare minimum requirements of a rug.

attributes.name: Freshwater Barrel
attributes.description: Filled with sweet water transported from the fresh glacier brooks of northern Aeternum.

attributes.name: Goldenrod Brocade Drapes
attributes.description: These silk drapes are a wonderful fusion of both Asian and European forms.

attributes.name: Goldenrod Brocade Valance
attributes.description: A golden swath of silk to hang in your window.

attributes.name: Goldenrod Geometric Rug
attributes.description: This silky-soft rug features a stylized keystone border. Its symmetrical perfection speaks to the mastery of the court artist who wove it.

attributes.name: Goldenrod Woven Floor Mat
attributes.description: The bright orange of this woven mat always brings a smile to your face. You just can't help it. It's such a happy color.

attributes.name: Golden Steel Storage Chest
attributes.description:
A chest that grants access to your storage, and increases your storage when placed in your home. 
With two locks and steel banding, your stuff's not going anywhere.

attributes.name: Gothic Posh Curtains
attributes.description: The captain is the only person on the ship allowed to sleep in. These heavy velvet curtains will block out every trace of early morning sun.

attributes.name: Gothic Posh Valance
attributes.description: This velvet valance is much too elegant to be useful.

attributes.name: Gothic Ragged Curtains
attributes.description: For when there is darkness in your soul, but not too much.

attributes.name: Grassy Curtains
attributes.description: Bring the spirit of the forest inside with these long green drapes. Their tallness reminds you of trees.

attributes.name: Grassy Drape
attributes.description: If you don't want to look out a window at the green rolling hills, you can look at this drape instead, with its green rolling fabric.

attributes.name: Grassy Valance
attributes.description: Bring the outdoors in with some grassy green fabric. Drapery never looked so good.

attributes.name: Grey Streamer Curtains
attributes.description: Cleverly repurposed from the debris of one of Aeternum's many, many shipwrecks.
